subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Any one can help me?
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
It's just a chamber, an enclosure, anything can be used depending on how
much room you have. The effect is like a mechanical sound filter. The larger
the siaze the lower tyhe effected frequencies.  I use tubing so it can be
made smaller to fit inside a cabinet.  I don't even measure anything when I
make an echo chamber, it's just made to fit whatever cabinet I'm using.

 The boxes work without the chamber, but the chamber seems to add something,
maybe a space where the sound can be more easily manipulated.

 F-S
